div.p: The editing, because I said to myself I can’t... like you see letting agencies or people behind the work, the admin work and things like that
I said I can’t do that 8 hours every day Monday to Friday just sitting behind a computer typing and looking at a screen, there is no way
I could do that. Then I realised to get those good pictures you have to edit and the more time you’re sitting behind the computer yourself
so it was a kind of a bit of a backfire! I mean for example for a christening I’d spend about 4 hours obviously during the photo shoot
then it will take about 2 days with the whole editing you know but the thing that got me into photography was the people,
the activity, the getting out there.
